name: Tile Jumper 2088
description:
Tile Jumper 2088

Welcome to the Future

Features
  • Walljump
    Press space while you are at a wall and you will propel to the other side with great force.
  • Spikes
    Laser Spikes are everywhere and they are dangerous for you so keep a safe distance.
  • Jumppad
    Use Jumppads to get to high places or in case they are on a wall they will propel you to the side.
